abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils score in overtime to defeat Detroit Red Wings 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Palmieri scored in overtime to give the Devils a 3-2 victory at home over the Detroit Red Wings on Friday night.

headline.main: Down by 2 in Third, Devils Win in Overtime
headline.print_headline: Devils Trail by 2 in Third but Win in Overtime

snippet: Kyle Palmieri scored in overtime to give the Devils a 3-2 victory at home over the Detroit Red Wings on Friday night.
